ing: 1/4 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
1 tablespoon low-fat creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip LightÂ®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Simple Peanut Butter and Tomato Sandwich
des: "I have been making these for years! It's a recipe my grandma used to make us when we were kids. This seems like it wouldn't taste any good, but it is AMAZING!"
ins: Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread; sprinkle with white sugar. Spread creamy salad dressing on the other slice of bread; top with tomato slices.  Sprinkle tomatoes with salt and pepper. Place the 2 sides together and enjoy!
